summary: A mother shares her daily routine while her daughter is on summer break, highlighting her work as a full-time mom with full-time help in Singapore. She takes her daughter for a haircut, visits a French-American bakery, and enjoys a bath with Epsom salt bath balm. The video captures various moments of their day, including a playful train ride and a visit to a playground.
keywords: motherhood, daily routine, haircut, French-American bakery, Epsom salt bath balm, train ride, playground, Singapore
